sledgehammer.lua

Class LuaArray<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.lua.LuaObject
        • sledgehammer.lua.LuaArray<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The Serialized Class to be defined for the Array.

    public class LuaArray<T>
extends LuaObject
    A very convenient LuaObject that stores elements as an ArrayList, allowing exporting into proper KahluaTables without any boilerplate code.
    Author:
    Jab

      • get

        public T get(int index)
        Parameters:
        index - The int offset in the Array.
        Returns:
        Returns the element located at the index of the Array. If nothing is defined at this index, null is returned.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        Returns the Integer length of the LuaArray.

      • toArray

        public T[] toArray()
        Returns:
        Returns a primitive Array of the elements stored in the LuaArray.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(T element)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
